attr.source: endemic worldwide in unvaccinated cat populations
attr.mechanism of action: replicates in rapidly dividing cells including lymphoid tissues, intestinal crypts, and developing fetuses

reference: https://www.avma.org/resources-tools/pet-owners/petcare/feline-panleukopenia; https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC7151839/; Decaro, N., & Buonavoglia, C. (2012).
